Mooth appa wagema Bailaya karaya. M.S. Fernando la mona bailada kivuwe. Moo ne Bila Raja. maykata bageta nemai hondatoma pissu. moo kivuwe muge Sarpaya vitharalu kolleak diha ahak arala baluwe naththe. yako aheng nemai wena thang wali eaya hondata wada gaththa. S deakak aragena Dosthara wenda SAITAM giya Sarpaya. mewage aya Dosthara unoth leddu dawseng wale thamai. me Sarpayage S dekata dosthara karo ganda maykage appath wali kawa SAITAM eka isthira karaganda. oitawada hodai Sarpayawa Kon Dosthara keneak kalalanag. Mokada dang inna Kon Dostharlatath thiyanawa Sarpayata wada sudusu kam. Ane kawuru hari kenek may yakata Isakudichchiyak wath dala muge may boru kelinaeka nawatha palla. May goiyata me para amathaka wela desha palane patang gaththa hati kiyanda. yanthang Vijaya Kumarathungata nidahase inda dunna. habai maypara ara ahinsaka D.B.Jijethungawa alla gaththa. mooge mole nanag hondatoma koloppang. ane ara Sarpayatath me ladema hadaida?
